body_html:
I switched to with_rank for the shape checking. Looking cleaner now, thanks!

This is necessary because of this shape check in the reverse_sequence op:

tensorflow/tensorflow/python/ops/array_ops.py

Line 1014 in d1b8333

if batch_dim >= input_shape.ndims:
. We can't promote the input to rank 2 there, because tf.reverse_sequence does not make assumptions about the exact rank of the input.

. We can't promote the input to rank 2 there, because tf.reverse_sequence does not make assumptions about the exact rank of the input.
body:
I switched to `with_rank` for the shape checking. Looking cleaner now, thanks!

This is necessary because of this shape check in the `reverse_sequence` op: https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/d1b8333effdcb031e6e34a2835a2f1c877fdd79b/tensorflow/python/ops/array_ops.py#L1014. We can't promote the input to rank 2 there, because `tf.reverse_sequence` does not make assumptions about the exact rank of the input.
